languages.text: "Это было забавно, но шутка затянулась". {n}Теодора нехорошо косится на дознавателя.{/n} "Очевидно, что {mf|сей|сия} ерети{mf|к|чка} пляшет под твою дудку. {mf|Его|Ее} слово против моего? Ты проиграл, не успев обнажить меч, Хейнрикс".

traits.locale_text: "Это было забавно, но шутка затянулась". {n}Теодора нехорошо косится на дознавателя.{/n} "Очевидно, что {mf|сей|сия} ерети{mf|к|чка} пляшет под твою дудку. {mf|Его|Ее} слово против моего? Ты проиграл, не успев обнажить меч, Хейнрикс".
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

languages.text: "It was amusing but the joke has outstayed its welcome." {n}Theodora shoots the Interrogator a nasty look.{/n} "It is painfully obvious this heretic is dancing to your tune. {mf|His|Her} word against mine? You had lost before you even unsheathed your blade, Heinrix."
languages.original_text: "Это было забавно, но шутка затянулась". {n}Теодора нехорошо косится на дознавателя.{/n} "Очевидно, что {mf|сей|сия} ерети{mf|к|чка} пляшет под твою дудку. {mf|Его|Ее} слово против моего? Ты проиграл, не успев обнажить меч, Хейнрикс".

traits.locale_text: "It was amusing but the joke has outstayed its welcome." {n}Theodora shoots the Interrogator a nasty look.{/n} "It is painfully obvious this heretic is dancing to your tune. {mf|His|Her} word against mine? You had lost before you even unsheathed your blade, Heinrix."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

languages.text: « C'était amusant au départ, mais la plaisanterie a assez duré, {n}intervient Théodora en lançant un regard noir à l'interrogateur.{/n} De toute évidence, {mf|cet hérétique|cette hérétique} est votre pantin. Sa parole contre la mienne ? C'est une partie perdue d'avance, Heinrix. »
languages.original_text: "It was amusing but the joke has outstayed its welcome." {n}Theodora shoots the Interrogator a nasty look.{/n} "It is painfully obvious this heretic is dancing to your tune. {mf|His|Her} word against mine? You had lost before you even unsheathed your blade, Heinrix."

traits.locale_text: « C'était amusant au départ, mais la plaisanterie a assez duré, {n}intervient Théodora en lançant un regard noir à l'interrogateur.{/n} De toute évidence, {mf|cet hérétique|cette hérétique} est votre pantin. Sa parole contre la mienne ? C'est une partie perdue d'avance, Heinrix. »
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

languages.text: “真有趣，但这个笑话已经过时了。”{n}西奥多拉恶狠狠瞪了海因里希一眼。{/n}“很明显，这个异端分子只是你的傀儡而已。是{mf|他|她}的话有分量，还是我的话有分量？甚至早在你拔刀之前，你就已经输了，海因里希。”
languages.original_text: "It was amusing but the joke has outstayed its welcome." {n}Theodora shoots the Interrogator a nasty look.{/n} "It is painfully obvious this heretic is dancing to your tune. {mf|His|Her} word against mine? You had lost before you even unsheathed your blade, Heinrix."

traits.locale_text: “真有趣，但这个笑话已经过时了。”{n}西奥多拉恶狠狠瞪了海因里希一眼。{/n}“很明显，这个异端分子只是你的傀儡而已。是{mf|他|她}的话有分量，还是我的话有分量？早在你拔刀之前，你就已经输了，海因里希。”
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

languages.text: 「面白いジョークだったが、もはや冗長だな」{n}シオドーラはインテロゲイターに意地の悪い視線を送った。{/n}「この異端者がお前の言いなりになっているのは明らかだ。こいつと私の言葉が食い違うだと？お前は剣を抜く前から負けているぞ、ハインリックス」
languages.original_text: "It was amusing but the joke has outstayed its welcome." {n}Theodora shoots the Interrogator a nasty look.{/n} "It is painfully obvious this heretic is dancing to your tune. {mf|His|Her} word against mine? You had lost before you even unsheathed your blade, Heinrix."

traits.locale_text: 「面白いジョークだったが、もはや冗長だな」{n}シオドーラはインテロゲイターに意地の悪い視線を送った。{/n}「この異端者がお前の言いなりになっているのは明らかだ。こいつと私の言葉が食い違うだと？お前は剣を抜く前から負けているぞ、ハインリックス」
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

languages.text: "Wie durchaus unterhaltsam, aber der Witz wird langsam fad." {n}Theodora wirft dem Interrogator einen unangenehmen Blick zu.{/n} "Es ist schmerzhaft offensichtlich, dass {mf|dieser Ketzer|diese Ketzerin} voll nach Eurer Pfeife tanzt. {mf|Sein|Ihr} Wort gegen meins? Ihr hattet bereits verloren, bevor Ihr noch zur Klinge gegriffen habt, Heinrix."
languages.original_text: "It was amusing but the joke has outstayed its welcome." {n}Theodora shoots the Interrogator a nasty look.{/n} "It is painfully obvious this heretic is dancing to your tune. {mf|His|Her} word against mine? You had lost before you even unsheathed your blade, Heinrix."

traits.locale_text: "Wie durchaus unterhaltsam, aber der Witz wird langsam fad. {n}Theodora wirft dem Interrogator einen unangenehmen Blick zu.{/n} "Es ist schmerzhaft offensichtlich, dass {mf|dieser Ketzer|diese Ketzerin} voll nach Eurer Pfeife tanzt. {mf|Sein|Ihr} Wort gegen meins? Ihr hattet bereits verloren, bevor Ihr noch zur Klinge gegriffen habt, Heinrix."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

languages.text: «Ha tenido su gracia, pero ya está bien de tonterías». {n}Theodora lanza una agresiva mirada al interrogador.{/n} «Salta a la vista que {mf|este|esta} hereje está bailando al son que usted le marca. ¿Su palabra contra la mía? Ha perdido este duelo antes de desenvainar, Heinrix».
languages.original_text: "It was amusing but the joke has outstayed its welcome." {n}Theodora shoots the Interrogator a nasty look.{/n} "It is painfully obvious this heretic is dancing to your tune. {mf|His|Her} word against mine? You had lost before you even unsheathed your blade, Heinrix."

traits.locale_text: «Ha tenido su gracia, pero ya está bien de tonterías». {n}Theodora lanza una agresiva mirada al interrogador.{/n} «Salta a la vista que {mf|este|esta} hereje está bailando al son que usted le marca. ¿Su palabra contra la mía? Ha perdido este duelo sin llegar a desenvainar la espada, Heinrix».
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

languages.text: "Başta hepimiz güldük ama bu şaka fazla uzadı." {n}Theodora, Sorgucu'ya ağır bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Bu kâfirin siz ne isterseniz onu yaptığı acıklı derecede bariz. Hangimizin dediğine inanacaklar? Daha hamleni yapamadan kaybettin Heinrix."
languages.original_text: "It was amusing but the joke has outstayed its welcome." {n}Theodora shoots the Interrogator a nasty look.{/n} "It is painfully obvious this heretic is dancing to your tune. {mf|His|Her} word against mine? You had lost before you even unsheathed your blade, Heinrix."

traits.locale_text: "Bir süreliğine hepimiz eğlendik ama bu şaka fazla uzadı." {n}Theodora, Sorgucu'ya ağır bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Bu kâfirin siz ne isterseniz onu yaptığı acıklı derecede bariz. Onun sözlerine karşı benimkiler ha? Daha kılıcını çekemeden kaybettin Heinrix."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora
